title: Implement the Value Class Constructor
description:
Implement the `Value` class constructor. A `Value` wraps a float `data` and tracks:
- `data`: the scalar value
- `grad`: gradient, initialized to 0.0
- `_children`: set of child Value objects (for graph tracking)
- `_op`: string describing the operation that produced this value
- `_backward`: a function (lambda) that does nothing by default

Also implement `__repr__` to return `'Value(data=X.XXXX)'`.
hints: _children should be converted to a set
